customProperties.description: A more restrictive area for custom boolean-only properties to be stored.
customProperties.markdownDescription: A more restrictive area for custom boolean-only properties to be stored.

type.description: Generally this should be omitted, as the type of the base item will be used.
type.markdownDescription: Generally this should be omitted, as the type of the base item will be used.

property.description: Generally this should be omitted, as the properties of the base item will be used.
property.markdownDescription: Generally this should be omitted, as the properties of the base item will be used.

propertyAdd.description: Additional properties to grant the specific variant, if not already present on the base item.
propertyAdd.markdownDescription: Additional properties to grant the specific variant, if not already present on the base item.

propertyRemove.description: Properties to remove from the specific variant, if present on the base item.
propertyRemove.markdownDescription: Properties to remove from the specific variant, if present on the base item.

dmg2.description: The versatile or alternative damage dice of the weapon, e.g. "1d10"
dmg2.markdownDescription: The versatile or alternative damage dice of the weapon, e.g. "1d10"

valueExpression.description: Expression used to calculate each specific variant's value.
valueExpression.markdownDescription: Expression used to calculate each specific variant's value.

weightExpression.description: Expression used to calculate each specific variant's weight.
weightExpression.markdownDescription: Expression used to calculate each specific variant's weight.

hasRefs.description: Whether this item has references within its data to dedicated "itemEntry"s.
hasRefs.markdownDescription: Whether this item has references within its data to dedicated "itemEntry"s.

customProperties.description: An unrestricted area for custom properties to be stored.
customProperties.markdownDescription: An unrestricted area for custom properties to be stored.

currencyConversion.description: ID of a value conversion table. Homebrew only.
currencyConversion.markdownDescription: ID of a value conversion table. Homebrew only.

ammo.description: Adds ammunition text to the header of the generic variant.
ammo.markdownDescription: Adds ammunition text to the header of the generic variant.
